originalText.text: Dr. Schumaker is one of the best doctors that my son has had, and we’re very grateful to have came across her. She’s very kind, understanding and amazing at what she does. Although she has so many patients, she’s always made us feel heard, cared for, and right when you meet her you feel as though you can trust her because of her down to earth, and great attitude. Thank you very much for all that you’ve done for us Dr. Schumaker!

text.text: Dr. Schumaker is one of the best doctors that my son has had, and we’re very grateful to have came across her. She’s very kind, understanding and amazing at what she does. Although she has so many patients, she’s always made us feel heard, cared for, and right when you meet her you feel as though you can trust her because of her down to earth, and great attitude. Thank you very much for all that you’ve done for us Dr. Schumaker!

originalText.text: Our favorite doctor! Dr Schumaker is so knowledgeable and simply wonderful with children. She listens carefully and takes the time to understand our concerns and work on a plan with us. We feel so confident with her care and grateful she is our doctor.

text.text: Our favorite doctor! Dr Schumaker is so knowledgeable and simply wonderful with children. She listens carefully and takes the time to understand our concerns and work on a plan with us. We feel so confident with her care and grateful she is our doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Schumaker is a fabulous, compassionate professional I would recommend strongly. We could not be happier with her services, and her team is off the charts; they supported my family at each touchpoint of the medical process (Still ongoing). Everyone in practice goes above and beyond to create a safe, informed, caring, and highly effective medical experience.

originalText.text: As with all doctors from NYP, Dr. Schumaker is absolutely wonderful. She is great with children. She really takes her time to listen and provide feedback to parents. She is attentive, informative and very pleasant. I would highly recommend her.

text.text: As with all doctors from NYP, Dr. Schumaker is absolutely wonderful. She is great with children. She really takes her time to listen and provide feedback to parents. She is attentive, informative and very pleasant. I would highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr. Schumaker is incredibly warm and professional. She is so compassionate towards the children and takes the time to explain herself in an age appropriate manner. I trust her completely and highly recommend her!
